name: You Make The Call Football!
description:
First and ten? Fourth and inches?  Third and long?

Should you dial up a quick pass?  Go for the long bomb?  Or commit to the running game?

You Make The Call!

You Make The Call Football! is a text based simulation of American Football where you assume the role of offensive and defensive play caller for your team.

Features:

* Simplified '3-play' play book captures all the fun of football play calling without any unwanted complexity!

* 5 levels of sophisticated AI opponents to challenge your play calling skills!

* Text based gameplay for the ultimate retro experience!

* Thrilling sounds and music from OpenGameArt.org!

Created for the OGA Summer 2021 Game Jam, You Make The Call Football! brings you the thrill of football play calling to your home computer!

System Requirements:

Windows PC

Microsoft .NET Framework vers 4.0 (or better)

10mb Free Hard Drive Space
